text: "Till We Ain't Strangers Anymore" is a song by American rock band Bon Jovi, from their tenth studio album, Lost Highway (2007). ==Music video== A music video was released in November 22, 2007. The music video for "Till We Ain't Strangers Anymore" features Jon Bon Jovi and LeAnn Rimes walking around the streets of New York City at night. The video debuted at number 17 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of November 8, 2007. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs
title: Till We Ain't Strangers Anymore
